original: Lundblad, Erik Gustaf August, rektor, Mariestad, f. 5/4/82 i Järpås, Ska-rab. 1., av kontr :pro’sten Gustaf L. o. Hildegard Beckman. G. 19 m. gymn:- dir. Gerd Tärnö. Barn: Ingegerd f. 20, Gunnar 21, d. 29, Anna-Lisa 24, Margareta 27, Gunilla 30. — Mog:ex. i Skara 01, fil. kand. i Upps. 07, prov-år i Sthlm 09-10. Res. t. Tysld., Ös-terr., Ung. 05, HolL, Engl. 07, 38. Lär. v. Beskowska sk. i Sthlm 07-08, vik. adj. v. Södermalms h. a. 1. 09, extra-lär. i Västerås 10-11, adj. i fysik, ma-tem. o. kemi v. Skara h. a. 1. 11, vik. lektor där 16-17, rektors ’skriv-bitr. 17-28 o. vik. rektor olika per. 21- 27, rektor f. Mariestads samrealsk. 28-45, v. Mariestads komm. gymn. sed. 45. Skolöverstyr. ombud v. realex. i Hjo 26 o. 27, avg. förslag t. provräkn. i realex. 29 o. 30. Ordf. i styr. f. stadsbibi., led. av styr. f. yrkessk., folksk :styr., kyrkofullm., styr. f. Ska-rab. läns ränteanst., styr. f. Sophie Löfvenskiölds stift. m. m. Medl. av OD. Hobby: musik. RVO, Skarab. skvtteförb. förtj :M, Skarab. bef:utb:-förb. förtj :M.
translated: Lundblad, Erik Gustaf August, principal, Mariestad, b. 5/4/82 in Järpås, Ska-rab. 1st, son of the vicar Gustaf L. and Hildegard Beckman. Married in 19 with Gerd Tärnö, director of gymnastics. Children: Ingegerd b. 20, Gunnar b. 21, deceased 29, Anna-Lisa b. 24, Margareta b. 27, Gunilla b. 30. Completed teacher training in Skara in 01, Bachelor of Arts in Uppsala in 07, probationary year in Stockholm 09-10. Traveled to Germany, Austria, Hungary in 05, the Netherlands and England in 07 and 38. Taught at Beskowska school in Stockholm 07-08, substitute assistant at Södermalm girls' school 09, substitute teacher in Västerås 10-11, physics, mathematics, and chemistry teacher at Skara girls' school 11, substitute lecturer there 16-17, acting principal's secretary 17-28, and acting principal at various times from 21-27. Principal of Mariestad coeducational school from 28-45, and vice principal of Mariestad municipal gymnasium since 45. Representative for the board of the Hjo coeducational school in 26 and 27, proposed examiner for the coeducational school in 29 and 30. Chairman of the board of the city library, member of the board of vocational school, elementary school board, church council, board of Skara County's interest rates, board of Sophie Löfvenskiölds foundation, etc. Member of the Royal Order of Vasa. Hobby: music. Received the Royal Order of Vasa, Skaraborg county shooting association's Merit Medal, and Skaraborg county adult education association's Merit Medal.

structured.name: Erik Gustaf August Lundblad
memberships: Ordre de Vasa (Royal Order of Vasa)
Skaraborgs skytteförbunds förtjänstmedalj (Skaraborg County Shooting Association's Merit Medal)
